productBenefits.title: Manage your cash flow with credit options
productBenefits.secondaryText: $5000 Credit Card and 30-Day Account options available for Bunnings Trade.

productBenefits.title: Shop online and check out faster
productBenefits.secondaryText: Shop through the Bunnings PowerPass App and on the Bunnings Trade website.

productBenefits.title: Get better prices with trade discounts
Easier book-keeping using saved transaction records
productBenefits.secondaryText: Online and in-store receipts with MYOB integration through Bunnings Trade.

productBenefits.title: Access more value at Tool Kit Depot
productBenefits.secondaryText: PowerPass pricing is now available on purchases made in-store at Tool Kit Depot in SA and WA*.
